meanings.definition: To assign a task to be completed by someone outside of a company or organization.
meanings.sent1: The company outtasked the data entry work to a freelance specialist.
meanings.sent2: She outtasked the graphic design project to a talented artist.
meanings.sent3: The team outtasked the cookie baking to a professional chef.
meanings.sent4: He outtasked the car repair to a skilled mechanic.
meanings.sent5: Outtasked tasks are efficiently handled by external experts.

meanings.definition: The act of outsourcing a specific task or project to a third party.
meanings.sent1: Outtasked can lead to cost savings for the company.
meanings.sent2: The outtasked project was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The outtasked event planning made the party a success.
meanings.sent4: Outtasked services are becoming more popular in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The outtasked assignment was a seamless process for the team.
